meanings.sent1: The kapows of the fireworks filled the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The kapows of thunder could be heard in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The kapows of the balloons popping made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The kapows of the car backfiring startled the pedestrians.
meanings.sent5: The kapows of the drum set added energy to the music performance.

meanings.sent1: He kapows the ball with all his might, sending it flying.
meanings.sent2: She kapows the nail into the wall to hang the picture.
meanings.sent3: The chef kapows the dough to flatten it for the pizza.

meanings.sent5: The boxer kapows his opponent with a powerful punch.
